title: Application of chapter
context: [ยง539-12] Application of chapter. This chapter applies to registrations of securities in beneficiary form made before or after April 29, 1998, by decedents dying on or after April 29, 1998. [L 1998, c 63, pt of ยง1] Revision Note &ldquo;April 29, 1998&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this Act&rdquo;.
